# What development tool to use?
 * [http://robovero.org/index.php/tutorials/toolchain Crosstool-NG]
 * [http://fun-tech.se/stm32/gcc/index.php Fun-tech toolchain]
 * [http://www.code-red-tech.com/lpcxpresso.php Code Red]
  * Even the "getting started" didn't work without problems
   * Can't find project in zip-files
   * Examples don't debug (header files not found)
  * Not open source
 * [http://www.yagarto.de/ YAGARTO]
  * Doesn't contain IDE, but Eclipse is proposed.
  * The "Howto" actually works!
  * A lot of steps to take, but it's explained well.
  * Eclipse not supported on Windows Vista.
 * [http://www.devkit.tk/ devkitARM]
 * [http://www.coocox.org/CooCox_CoIDE.htm CoIDE]
  * Can use LPC-link: see [http://www.coocox.org/Forum/topic.php?id=741 Coocox Forum]
 * [http://gandalf.arubi.uni-kl.de/avr_projects/arm_projects/#winarm WinARM]
  * Last update from 2006.
 * [http://www.gnuarm.com/ GNUARM]
  * Seems to be dead.  No more updates after 2006.
